title: Terms to Enterprise Knowledge Graph
description: Interactive infographic MicroSim of the ten steps to move from a simple list of business terms to an agentic EKG
subject: Mathematics
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of terms to enterprise knowledge graph
Apply terms to enterprise knowledge graph to solve problems
Visualize and interpret terms to enterprise knowledge graph relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on terms to enterprise knowledge graph
